alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Monroe (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 4:17PM EST until February 24 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Buffalo NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New York... Oatka Creek At Garbutt affecting Monroe and Genesee Counties. .Rain and snowmelt led to rising levels on creeks and rivers. Flows in rivers and creeks will increase and reach critical levels. For the Oatka Creek...including Garbutt...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oatka Creek At Garbutt. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Flood stage, general flooding of agricultural land begins, some basement flooding in Scottsville and Garbutt. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 6.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.2 feet on 03/19/2003. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 415 AM EST.
